channel.title: SSH Problems
channel.description: Anyone who has played the version with steam fix knows that the keyborad keys won't work, and that to fix the problem the CFG from the regular half-life folder has to be copied over and pasted to the ssh folder. Unfortunately, when I do this ssh keys like Mouse 3 (Tertiary) are unbound, which makes it suck. Does anyon know how to fix this?

item.title: SSH Problems
item.dc:creator: Wasabi
item.description:
If you can upload the original SSH cfg and your Half-Life one it would help.

Read full topic
